long_description: With a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design, this waistpack carries all of your small essentials for leisure and training outings. AirFlow(TM) hybrid mesh technology wicks away moisture and circulates air between your back and the pack. Main zip compartment features 3 internal pockets designed for keys, cash, electronics, energy gels and essentials. On-the-go side access pockets hold small essentials such as keys, cash and lip balm. Fully adjustable belt for a comfortable fit.
short_description: With a comfortable, breathable and bounce-free design, this waistpack carries all of your small essentials for leisure and training outings.
